div.style: background:#750032; border-radius:0px 0px 0px 0px; font-weight:normal; font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; bottom:-2px; right: 150px; padding:4px 10px 4px 10px; font-size:24px; color:#fff;text-align:center; cursor:pointer;border:none;text-decoration: none;box-shadow: 0 0 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5); z-index:999999

strong.font: Distance Learning and all class materials are accessible through Google Classroom. Log in using your child's unique assigned username and password. If you do not have your child's username and password please reach out to your child’s teacher or call the school (203)691-6535. If you are experiencing any technical difficulties, please use the following link:
